infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This permission is required by the app to take receipt photo in order to upload to the backend.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This application requires the permission of the current location of the user for the convenience of shipping.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This permission is required by the app to save receipt photo to the photo library.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This permission is required by the app to upload receipt photo to the backend.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: This permission is not needed by the app, but it is required by an underlying API. If you see this dialog, contact us.
